content: peace sweater model dg1501 dale garn celebrates 10 years of peace read the story about the peace sweater on page 15 before you start always read the pattern before knitting to get a general understanding of the garment construction and avoid making mistakes choose the right yarn peace-sweater is designed in dale garn baby ull to achieve the best result we recommend using the yarn the garment is designed for watch the gauge to assure correct measurement and shape it is important to obtain gauge we do not all knit the same way if your gauge is looser than the given gauge the garment will be larger if your gauge is tighter the garment will be smaller make a gauge swatch make a gauge swatch to check your gauge count number of stitches per 10 cm if you have more stitches change to larger needles if you have fewer stitches change to smaller needles the needle size given in a pattern is merely a suggestion just one size up or down can make a difference abbreviations co - cast on bobble = bind off st s = stitch es k = knit p = purl round = round b&f = back and forth decrease = together col = color house of yarn | peace sweater dg1501 2 38 10 x 10 32 2 + 2 5 2 + 2 5 2 5 15 cm gauge 2 dale garn baby ull peace sweater design randi sunde yarn dale garn baby ull 100% superwash merino 50 grams = app 165 meters sizes s m l xl xxl finished measurements chest 88 94 101 107 113 cm 34 5/8 37 39 3/4 42 1/8 44 1/2 full length 62 64 66 68 70 cm 24 1/2 25 1/4 26 26 3/4 27 1/2 sleeve length app 48 49 50 51 52 cm 18 7/8 19 1/4 19 3/4 20 20 1/2 colors used color 1 off white 0017 color 2 beige heather 3841 color suggestions alternativ iv alternativ i color 1 natural 0020 materials color 1 mist 2425 color 2 powder pink 4202 color 1 7 8 9 10 11 balls color 2 light lilac 4203 color 2 5 6 7 8 9 balls alternativ v alternativ ii color 1 black 0090 needle suggestion color 1 light grey heather 0004 color 2 off white 0017 short and long cir needle 2 mm and 2 5mm dp needles 2 5 mm color 2 charcoal heather 0083 alternativ vi gauge 32 sts over st st and border alternativ iii color 1 barn red 4137 and 38 row = 10 x 10 cm color 1 natural 0020 color 2 natural 0020 color 2 light eggplant 4435 accessories zipper 15 cm 2 buttons 1 5 cm body back co 282 302 322 342 362 sts using col 1 and smaller cir needle = 135 145 153 163 171 sts work st st in the round for 3 cm and p 1 round to fold work border acc
